pr_title: CAMEL-15144: Add capability to customize BindableService class generation

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should prefix it with grpc, eg grpcBindableServiceFactory
timeline.author: davsclaus

replies.bodyText: Yeah, good point. I'll do that.
replies.author: jamesnetherton
